Are you interested in running own #Cardano stake pool? You need the following hardware:  - 4 GB of RAM - A good network connection and about 1 GB of * bandwidth/hour - A public ip4 address - Processor speed is not a significant factor  No ASIC, no energy wasting.  $ada $btc $xrp  https://t.co/dmQeADNciq

1/2 If you missed the testnet snapshots you won't be able to stake your $ADA during the Shelley testnet phase beginning next week, but hopes are full Shelley will be released in just a couple months where everyone can stake from production Daedalus & Yoroi.  Testing is important!

Stake pools have 3 ways to earn $ADA:  Fixed Fees (USD) (impacts share with participants)  Operator Rewards (impacts share with participants) Delegation Rewards (does not impact share)  Performance is biggest factor, so no/low fee won't always mean best.  Offline - no blocks.🤔
